participant_1.background:
I love my family and I'm sure they would love me no matter what.
i love the outdoors.
I hope my wedding planning business keeps booming as the weather warms up.
my dad is very strict with his kids.
my favorite book is david copperfield.

participant_2.background:
I am happy and healthy at my current weight.
I like to spend time with my family in different ways.
my favorite book that i have read lately is middlesex.
i have a large mustache.
I'm always building models of sports cars, so I guess racing is my favorite sport.

content.text: What's your favorite book?
Middlesex.
I love that book! I read it several times. It's so beautifully written. What do you like about it?
I love how it explores gender and sexuality in such a nuanced way. It's also a really great coming-of-age story.
I agree! It's such a well-written book. What are some of your other favorite books?
I love Jane Austen. And I also love David Copperfield.
I love Jane Austen too! She's one of my favorite authors. David Copperfield is good too. I haven't read it in a while, but I remember enjoying it.
You should read it again! It's a great book.
I will! What else do you like to do for fun?
I like to spend time with my family. We go on a lot of hikes and bike rides together. We also like to go camping.
That sounds really fun! I love hiking and camping too. I don't get to do it as often as I'd like, but I always enjoy it when I do.
Yeah, it's a great way to get outside and enjoy nature.
I agree! Do you have any other hobbies?
I like to build models of sports cars. I'm always working on a new one.
That's cool! I've always wanted to try that. It sounds like a fun hobby.
It is! It's a lot of fun to see your project come together.
I bet! Do you have any pictures of your models?
Yeah, I have a few. Here's one of my latest ones.
Wow! That's really cool! You're very talented.
Thanks! I'm glad you like it.
